question.question: An object starts with an initial velocity of 13.15 m/s and an acceleration of -4.75 m/s². What is its velocity and displacement after 3.48 seconds?

An object starts with an initial velocity of 17.95 m/s and an acceleration of -4.13 m/s². What is its velocity and displacement after 4.8 seconds?
An object starts with an initial velocity of 1.57 m/s and an acceleration of -2.81 m/s². What is its velocity and displacement after 5.55 seconds?
An object starts with an initial velocity of 1.5 m/s and an acceleration of -3.01 m/s². What is its velocity and displacement after 6.85 seconds?
